summary: This document is a series of suicide watch observation logs for inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 23-24, 2019. It includes chronological logs and inmate history records showing he was on suicide watch during this period, which ended on July 24, 2019, at 08:45.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch logs, identified by name and register number, being observed in his cell at MCC New York.

events.title: Epstein placed on suicide watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Suicide watch observation period
events.description: Detailed 5-minute interval observations of Epstein's behavior and condition were logged by correctional staff.

events.title: Suicide watch ended
events.description: Epstein's suicide watch status was terminated at 08:45 hours.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on an active suicide watch from at least July 6, 2019, through July 24, 2019, at MCC New York.
The logs show 5-minute interval observations of Epstein's behavior and condition, though the handwritten notes are largely illegible.
The suicide watch officially ended on July 24, 2019, at 08:45, according to the inmate history record.
The document is a standard Bureau of Prisons suicide watch chronological and observation log form.
